= MyDAS 1.6 Tutorial =

== Third Part: Developing a Data Source from a database ==

Now that you have the basis to create a data source in MyDAS, let start with a real  scenario in bioinformatics. Well actually we are gonna use the same kind of data of the previous tutorial, but now we are gonna take the information from the original source: Ensenmbl.
